description: Number of set partitions T'_t(n) of {1,2,...,t} into exactly n parts, with an even number of elements in each part distinguished by marks, and such that no part contains both 1 and t with 1 unmarked or both i and i+1 with i+1 unmarked for some i with 1 <= i < t; triangle T'_t(n), t>=0, 0<=n<=t, read by rows.
